definition: Huanglong county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
Huanglong county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
huanglongbing, citrus greening disease

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黄龙体育馆的屋面板采用贝姆屋面系统。

sentences.english: Burning fire dragon in Huanglongxi dated back to the Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙溪烧火龙起源于南宋时期。

sentences.english: Why I feel the climb up at Huanglong this time a lot easier than last?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么觉得这次爬黄龙比上次轻松多了？

sentences.english: To protect Huanglong is to save our mankind.
sentences.chinese: 保护黄龙就是保护我们人类。

sentences.english: Daniel, coming to Huanglong again, why are you so excited?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，再次来到黄龙，你怎么这么兴奋？

sentences.english: Thus three ponds of different sizes appeared as the home of the Yellow Dragon's family.
sentences.chinese: 铲出了三个大小不等的潭作为黄龙一家的栖息地。

sentences.english: Huanglong Mountain Reclamation was given during the war established under the social background.
sentences.chinese: 陕西黄龙山垦区是在战时特定的社会背景下形成的。

sentences.english: Huanglong is one of the State-Level AAAA Tourist Attractions.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙是国家AAAA级风景名胜区。

sentences.english: Letting roads give way to trees is an innovation in environmental protection at Huanglong.
sentences.chinese: 路让树这是黄龙环保工作的一项创举。

sentences.english: Viewer friends, now is the most beautiful season at Huanglong.
sentences.chinese: 观众朋友们，现在是黄龙最美丽的季节。

sentences.english: Tour in Huanglong is also a spiritual tour to experience the Tibetan and Qiang culture.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙之旅也是体验藏羌文化的精神之旅。

sentences.english: The county government has yet to release the body, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 县政府还没有交出他儿子的遗体，吴黄龙说。

sentences.english: By early afternoon the river has opened up and finally we see it - ancient Huanglonxi.
sentences.chinese: 午后不久，眼前终于出现了黄龙溪的身影。

sentences.english: Huanglong is one of the best sight-seeing spots in the world.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙是世界上最佳观光地之一。

sentences.english: Huanglong is developing Eco-tourism in a sustainable way.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙正在走一条可持续发展的战略生态旅游之路。

sentences.english: On the Establishment of Student-oriented Servicing Idea in Vocational Schools;
sentences.chinese: 黄龙立足于绿色旅游的观念，服务日趋完善成熟。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Heishui county (Tibetan: khro chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Chishui county level city in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou
Kowloon district of Hong Kong
Jinsha county in Bijie prefecture 畢節地區|毕节地区[Bi4 jie2 di4 qu1], Guizhou/Chinsha town in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
Lake Tianchi in Xinjiang
main mountain of a region
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
Tianshui prefecture level city in Gansu
phoenix
Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
nickname of Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮/Wolong giant panda nature reserve 臥龍大熊貓保護區|卧龙大熊猫保护区 in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan/Wolong district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
lit. hidden dragon/fig. emperor in hiding
Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤[Pu3 xian2]/Emeishan city
Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
magic cloud
Jinyang county in Liangshan Yi autonomous prefecture 涼山彞族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2 shan1 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], south Sichuan
